entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Fog dissipating near noon. High minus 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MDT Sunday 08 May 2016
